about_the_game:
This is a collection of character songs inspired by the characters of U-ena: Girl of Distant Fireworks.
Please listen to the voices of Yuena and Shinonome as they sing songs that are not played in the main story, including newly written songs exclusive to the album and familiar OP songs.

Please note that this album is a character song album and does not contain any background music.
detailed_description:
This is a collection of character songs inspired by the characters of U-ena: Girl of Distant Fireworks.

Please note that this album is a character song album and does not contain any background music.
name: U-ena Character Songs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 58.4 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 515 MB available space
